title: DARK.Repack.R.G.Origami.[Update 1]

Game features:
======================
The modern world is full of incredibly horrible things - it flooded the vampires and other evil spirits.The main character, Eric Bain, wakes up these days and does not understand how he got here, and what happened during that time, while asleep.In
addition, Eric is also a vampire, what's not very much and happy.The project Dark necessary not only to move and act quickly, but also to show their vampiric abilities.

Depending on the character, you can create your own style of play.
Dark - a combination of "stealth" and role-playing games, is dedicated to the history of a certain vampire who lives in the "modern world."One day our hero wakes up in the bar with the usual for such situations amnesia.What was it before?How did we get here? ..
Using vampiric superpowers, will explore "a world full of blood and darkness," and try to regain his memory.
